name: World of Dungeons: Crawler RPG
description:
Plunge into fierce turn-based squad battles in World of Dungeons, the new dark fantasy RPG!

Build your squad of fearless heroes and set off to explore the infernal and darkest worlds where you’ll wage your own wars against the undead, monsters and demons.
Train your heroes in any of the 6 classes, equip them with weapons and armor - and then unleash your squad’s might and magic on the evil Bosses who are desperate eager to reap your immortal hunter soul!

World of Dungeons is a hardcore saga that combines the strategy and tactics of war-games and TBS with the ambiance of classic RPGs.

World of Dungeons: take the path of Chaos and Darkness!


Features:

-FREE TO PLAY: NO RESTRICTIONS. Access any item, hero or artifact just by playing the game.
- Try an unusual combination of genres: TBS, war-game and rogue-like RPG.
- Explore new worlds: the Gothic Necropolis, the bloodcurdling Tartarus, the frozen Helheim.
- Enjoy simple controls: no unnecessary windows, scroll bars, or switches.
- Dive into hell of fast-paced battles: 5-15 minutes per dungeon or Boss.
- Equip your heroes with hundreds of weapons and armor pieces of 6 rarity levels.
- Choose from 6 classes and hundreds of abilities and spells, forming a huge web of skills.
- Find new paths, quests, heroes, classes and weapons in regular future updates.
